titleStmt.title: Digital description of MS. Heb. c. 17

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on Catalogue of the Hebrew Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, vol. ii, by Adolf Neubauer and Arthur Ernest Cowley, Oxford 1906, No. 2661.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card (for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Admissions). Contact specialcollections.enquiries@bodleian.ox.ac.uk for further information on the availability of this manuscript

msItem.title: Mishnah: אבות i. 11 (אחריכם) to iii. 14 (נתתי לכם).

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 6) אבות vi. 5 (אהוב) to end, postscript סליק אבות וקנין תורה
(fol. 6b) דרך ארץ זוטא i, ends ותפייס

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 7) iv. 7 (יוסה אומר החושך) to 20 (הזקנים למה דומה)

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Mishnah

msItem.p: (fol. 9) אבות iii. 9 (חטאו קודמת) to iv. 1 (כי תאכל)
(fol. 10) דרך ארץ זוטא ii (ואינו שלך) to iii (על מנת לשלם ואם)

msItem.note: No sections for אבות or דרך ארץ.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).
Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.note: With vowel points and some accents.

msItem.note: With some vowel points and accents.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Mishnah
msItem.note: The Mishnahs are here called הילכתא, heading and colophon in Aramaic. Divisions פרקא, הילכתא, הנא; with superlinear vowel points.

physDesc.p: Yemen Rabb. char.; fol., vellum, injured.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

physDesc.p: Yemen squ. char.; 2 coll., fol., vellum.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Babylonian Talmud שבת from fol. 6b, l. 4 from below (היחיד לשבת) to fol. 10, l. 6 from below (שלום)
msItem.note: passages are headed פיס̇ ; some words with vowel points.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Babylonian Talmud ראש השנה from fol. 25b, l. 6 (כאביר) to fol. 26b, l. 9 from below (בפשוטין)

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 55) from fol. 72, l. 27 (להן קיצבה) to fol. 73b, l. 8 from below (אמר רב דאמר כי האי תנא)
(fol. 56) from fol. 80, l. 23 (אמר משלחין) to fol. 81b to the Mishnah.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 57) ביצה from fol. 31b, l. 5 (יום טוב מבקעין) to fol. 34 illegible
(fol. 58) עבודה זרה from fol. 68b, l. 11 from below (אסריה רחמנא) to fol. 72 Mishnah

physDesc.p: Small Syr. Rabb. char.; fol., vellum, injured.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Babylonian Talmud סוכה from fol. 29b (Mishnah) to fol. 31, l. 12 from below (לאו משום)

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

physDesc.p: Syr. Rabb. char.; small folio, vellum.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Babylonian Talmud סנהדרין from fol. 60, l. 3 from below (והשני) to fol. 61b, l. 3 (וטאעי)

physDesc.p: Syr. curs. char.; small 4to, vellum, slightly injured.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 63) סנהדרין from fol. 108b, l. 13 from below (טרף) to fol. 109, l. 23 from below (אשכחו אמר רב)
(fol. 64) מגלה from fol. 3b, l. 14 (בית רבי) to fol. 4b, l.15 (הכניסה כדי)

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 65) from fol. 31b, l.16 (במשנתינו) to fol. 32, l. 4 from below (כשרים מכל)
(fol. 66) from fol. 37, l. 3 (הראשונה) to fol. 37b, l.12 from below (וקיבלתו)

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 67) from fol. 81, l. 9 (דרכים מפני) to fol. 81b, l. 16 from below (מוצא מת מוטל)
(fol. 68) from fol. 83b, l. 1 to fol. 83b, l. 30 (כי יתן מום)

physDesc.p: Large Syr. char.; broad fol., vellum.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Babylonian Talmud בבא מציעא from fol. 78b, l. 13 (לפורים ואין מדקדקין) to fol. 85b, l. 22 (מישתכח)

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Babylonian Talmud כתובות from fol. 77b, l. 15 (ודיבן ; ed. ודייבי) to fol. 79b, l. 8 (למיתה אפילו)

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Babylonian Talmud: כתובות from fol. 106b, l. 5 from below (ר̇ עקיבא אין משתכרין) to fol. 108, l. 8 (אפילו תימא)

physDesc.p: Syr. squ. char.; small fol., vellum.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 82) from fol. 10b, l. 15 from below (אחת ומחצה) to fol. 11b, l. 23 from below (אמר רב יהודה)
(fol. 83) from fol. 67, l. 8 (מר עוקבא) to fol. 68b, l. 4 (ומפקידה לפקידה)

physDesc.p: Syr. squ. char.; 4to, vellum, margins slightly injured, ff. 82b and 83a obliterated.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: (fol. 84) from fol. 29, l. 18 from below (האכא טהורה) to fol. 29b, l. 14 from below (אם העולם הזה)
(fol. 85) from fol. 30b, l. 19 (ששנא ר̇ שמעון) to fol. 31b, l. 7 from below (דאמר בסוף שיטה)

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.p: Fol. 86. בכורות from fol. 42, l. 9 (ת̇ש̇ הנרבע) to fol. 59b, l. 17 (להו במנין)

msItem.title: ערכין

msItem.p: (fol. 102) from fol. 18, l. 18 (איכא שכרה) to fol. 19, l. 7 (מעשה)
(fol. 103) from fol. 21, l. 22 (אמר ר̇ פפא) to fol. 21b, l. 4 from below (שומא כל)

msItem.note: The Mishnah is given before the פרק.

physDesc.p: Large Syr. squ. char.; broad fol., vellum.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Babylonian Talmud: בבא קמא, Alfasi
msItem.note: from צריכא דאיתנהו לזוזי רב אמר הרי זה מקח טעות to ההוא תורא דנפל לאריתא, last words somewhat different from the edition.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).
